pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit and Deploy DECORATE Trees // DECORATE (Diverse Ensemble Creation by Oppositional Relabeling of Artificial Training Examples) builds an ensemble of J48 trees by recursively adding artificial samples of the training data ("Melville, P., Mooney, R. J. (2005) DOI:10.1016/j.inffus.2004.04.001").
